channel.title: The Start of Something Huge (Don't want to post name incase it gets leached)
channel.description:
alright. My names Alex, i've been wanting to make a rsps since 08 but havn't had the team... i've programmed alot myself, but after about 2 weeks i've given up. I think with a team of 2 - 3 people we can make a success from day 1... i'm looking for people that are in the same position as me. I'm 15 years old and i need one or two partners that are familiar with the basics of html/php ... coding the basics... such as.. adding items/objects/shops/npcs (if you are more experienced such as adding quests etc... then PLEASE, i welcome you with open arms :D) ... Alright ... just leave me your skype and i will have a talk with you (via chat or video call, whichever you perfer) and i will see if you meet the standards of joining me :) - NieX
Server is PI 317. final project = webclient at: Www.(server-name-here).Org forums = Www.(server-name-here).org/Smf :) i can help with this ... it just helps me if you're familiar with the stuff..
P.S: Must be very fluent in english. I do NOT mind if you're from Europe or wherever, as long as you're strong in english. we're all good ;D
P.S.S: I'm from UK ... so relative timezones will be a advantage.

item.title: The Start of Something Huge (Don't want to post name incase it gets leached)
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:7, topic:434452”][quote author=NieX link=topic=537173.msg3927407#msg3927407 date=1330369893]
basics of html/php … coding the basics… such as… adding items/objects/shops/npcs (if you are more experienced such as adding quests etc.
[/quote]

sounds like html 2 me[/quote]
Html is for the webclient. I do NOT want to be in a position of doing all the website related work myself. Plus with a partner we can share views and see which is best for future standards.

Skyru:

May I ask why you don’t want to release the name of this project? I highly doubt someone would steal a project name, but that’s just my thought. But without a project name, there just isn’t that ‘flare’ that there needs to be for a great development… you get what i’m saying?

Yeh, i get where you are coming from. If you’re that desperate for the name and are willing to join then send your skype, we can talk it through. I would just MUCH rather keep it as low key as possible for the time being.

Read full topic
